◆ isOn()

bool oxygine::TextField::isOn ( const Vector2 &  localPosition,
float  localScale = 1.0f 
)
overridevirtual

Sets callback which would be called each Actor::render cycle before doRender. Use it if you don't want inherit from Actor and overload Actor::doRender.

Reimplemented from oxygine::Actor.

void oxygine::TextField::setHtmlText ( const std::string &  str)

Changes text. Supports pseudo html style tags:
- break line,

colored text

,

colored text

, in pair with oxygine-freetype you may use 'opt':

custom option

,

custom option with color

example: This is

colored text
supports
nested tags


with broken line.
